DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: 滑块表示一根条上的一系列值，用户可以从中选择一个值。 滑块组件适用于调节音量、亮度，或者图像滤镜的强度。

DemoList.Name: colors
DemoList.Title: 颜色
DemoList.Description: 您可以使用 Color、TrackColor 和 ThumbColor 属性设置滑块的颜色。
DemoList.Code: @code { public class Slider { public string Label { get; set; } public double Val { get; set; } public string Color { get; set; } } private Slider _ex1 = new Slider { Label = "color", Val = 25, Color = "orange darken-3" }; private Slider _ex2 = new Slider { Label = "track-color", Val = 75, Color = "green lighten-1" }; private Slider _ex3 = new Slider { Label = "thumb-color", Val = 50, Color = "red" }; }

DemoList.Name: disabled
DemoList.Title: 禁用
DemoList.Description: 您不能与 Disabled 滑块交互。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MRow>
      <MCol Cols="12">
        <MSlider
          Disabled
          Label="Disabled"
          Value="30D"
        ></MSlider>
      </MCol>
    </MRow>
  </MContainer>

DemoList.Name: discrete
DemoList.Title: 离散的
DemoList.Description: 离散滑块提供一个显示当前准确数量的标签。 您可以使用 Step 属性让滑块只能选择部分值。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard>
    <MCardText>
        <MSlider TValue="double"
                 Step="10"
                 ThumbLabel="true"
                 Ticks="true"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

@code {
    private double _value = 0;
  }

DemoList.Name: icons
DemoList.Title: 图标
DemoList.Description: 您可以使用 AppendIcon 和 PrependIcon 属性添加图标到滑块。 您可以使用 OnAppendClick 和 OnPrependClick 绑定图标点击事件回调函数。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Flat
       Color="transparent">
    <MSubheader>Media volume</MSubheader>
    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_media"
                 PrependIcon="mdi-volume-high"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>

    <MSubheader>Alarm volume</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_alarm"
                 AppendIcon="mdi-alarm"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>

    <MSubheader>Icon click callback</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_zoom"
                 AppendIcon="mdi-magnify-plus-outline"
                 PrependIcon="mdi-magnify-minus-outline"
                 OnAppendClick="ZoomIn"
                 OnPrependClick="ZoomOut"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

  @code {
    private double _media = 0;
    private double _alarm = 0;
    private double _zoom = 0;

    private void ZoomOut()
    {
        _zoom = _zoom - 10;
        if (_zoom < 0)
        {
            _zoom = 0;
        }
    }

    private void ZoomIn()
    {
        _zoom = _zoom + 10;
        if (_zoom > 100)
        {
            _zoom = 100;
        }
    }
  }

DemoList.Name: inverseLabel
DemoList.Title: 反向标签
DemoList.Description: 带有 InverseLabel 属性的 MSlider 的标签显示在末尾。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="12">
            <MSlider InverseLabel
                     Label="Inverse label"
                     Value="30D"></MSlider>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

DemoList.Name: minAndMax
DemoList.Title: 最小值和最大值
DemoList.Description: 您可以通过 Min 和 Max 设置滑块的最小值和最大值。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard
    Flat
    Color="transparent"
  >
    <MSubheader>Min and max default slider</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
      <MRow>
        <MCol Class="pr-4">
          <MSlider
            @bind-Value="_slider"
            Class="align-center"
            Max="_max"
            Min="_min"
            HideDetails="true"
          >
            <AppendContent>
              <MTextField
                @bind-Value="_slider"
                Class="mt-0 pt-0"
                HideDetails="true"
                SingleLine
                Type="number"
                Style="width: 60px"
              ></MTextField>
            </AppendContent>
          </MSlider>
        </MCol>
      </MRow>
    </MCardText>
  </MCard>

  @code{
    private double _min = -50;
    private double _max = 90;
    private double _slider = 40;
  }

DemoList.Name: readonly
DemoList.Title: 只读
DemoList.Description: 您不能与 Readonly 滑块交互，但它们看起来与普通滑块一样。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MRow>
      <MCol Cols="12">
        <MSlider
          Readonly
          Label="Readonly"
          Value="30D"
        ></MSlider>
      </MCol>
    </MRow>
  </MContainer>

DemoList.Name: step
DemoList.Title: 步长
DemoList.Description: MSlider 可以有1以上的步长。 这对您需要更准确地调整值的应用程序可能有帮助。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard>
    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 Step="10"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

  @code {
    private double _value = 10;
  }

DemoList.Name: thumb
DemoList.Title: 缩略图标签
DemoList.Description: 您可以使用 ThumbLabel 属性让滑块在滑动时始终显示缩略图标签。 可以通过 ThumbColor 属性设置缩略图颜色，通过 ThumbSize 属性设置大小。 使用 AlwaysDirty 属性可使其颜色保持不变，即使在 Min 值上也是如此。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="12">
            <MSubheader Class="pl-0">
                Show thumb when using _slider
            </MSubheader>
            <MSlider @bind-Value="_slider"
                     ThumbLabel="true"></MSlider>
        </MCol>

        <MCol Cols="12">
            <MSubheader Class="pl-0">
                Always show thumb label
            </MSubheader>
            <MSlider @bind-Value="_slider"
                     ThumbLabel="@("always")"></MSlider>
        </MCol>

        <MCol Cols="12">
            <MSubheader Class="pl-0">
                Custom thumb size
            </MSubheader>
            <MSlider @bind-Value="_slider"
                     ThumbSize="24"
                     ThumbLabel="@("always")"></MSlider>
        </MCol>

        <MCol Cols="12">
            <MSubheader Class="pl-0">
                Custom thumb label
            </MSubheader>
            <MSlider @bind-Value="_slider"
                     ThumbSize="24"
                     ThumbLabel="@("always")">
                <ThumbLabelContent Context="value">
                    @_satisfactionEmojis[Convert.ToInt32(Math.Min(Math.Floor(value / 10), 9D))]
                </ThumbLabelContent>
            </MSlider>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

  @code {
    private double _slider = 45;
    private List<string> _satisfactionEmojis = new List<string>
    {
        "😭", "😢", "☹️", "🙁", "😐", "🙂", "😊", "😁", "😄", "😍"
    };
  }

DemoList.Name: ticks
DemoList.Title: 刻度
DemoList.Description: 刻度线决定了用户能将滑块移动到的预定值。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Flat
       Color="transparent">
    <MSubheader>Show ticks when using slider</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 Step="10"
                 Ticks="true"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>

    <MSubheader>Always show ticks</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 Step="10"
                 Ticks="@("always")"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>

    <MSubheader>Tick size</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 Step="10"
                 Ticks="@("always")"
                 TickSize="4"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>

    <MSubheader>Tick labels</MSubheader>

    <MCardText>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_fruits"
                 TickLabels="_ticksLabels"
                 Max="3"
                 Step="1"
                 Ticks="@("always")"
                 TickSize="4"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

  @code {
    private double _value = 0;
    private double _fruits = 0;
    private List<string> _ticksLabels = new List<string>
        {
            "Figs",
          "Lemon",
          "Pear",
          "Apple"
        };
  }

DemoList.Name: validation
DemoList.Title: 验证
DemoList.Description: 支持外部验证。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Flat
       Color="transparent">
    <MSubheader>Rules</MSubheader>

    <MCardText class="pt-0">
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 ErrorMessages="_errorMessages"
                 Label="How many?"
                 Step="10"
                 ThumbLabel="@("always")"
                 Ticks="true"
                 TValue="double"
                 OnChange="HandleOnChange"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>

    <MSubheader>Persistent hint</MSubheader>

    <MCardText class="pt-0">
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 ErrorMessages="_errorMessages"
                 Hint="40 in stock"
                 Label="How many?"
                 PersistentHint
                 Step="10"
                 ThumbLabel="@("always")"
                 Ticks="true"
                 TValue="double"
                 OnChange="HandleOnChange"></MSlider>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

  @code {
    private double _value = 30;
    private List<string> _errorMessages = new List<string>();

    public void HandleOnChange(double val)
    {
        _value = val;
        if (_value <= 40)
        {
            _errorMessages = new List<string>();
        }
        else
        {
            _errorMessages = new List<string>
                {
                    "Only 40 in stock"
                };
        }
    }
  }

DemoList.Name: verticalSliders
DemoList.Title: 垂直滑块
DemoList.Description: 您可以使用 Vertical 属性将滑块切换为垂直方向。 如果您需要更改滑块的高度，请使用 CSS。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer>
    <MRow>
        <MSlider @bind-Value="_value"
                 Vertical
                 Label="Regular"></MSlider>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

  @code {
    private double _value = 10;
  }

DemoList.Name: appendAndPrepend
DemoList.Title: 附加代码
DemoList.Description: 使用 PrependContent 和 AppendContent 插槽来轻松自定义 MSlider 以便适应任何情况。
DemoList.Code: METRONOME mdi-share-variant @_bpm BPM @if (_isPlaying) { } @(_isPlaying ? "mdi-pause" : "mdi-play") mdi-minus mdi-plus @code { private double _bpm = 40; private bool _isPlaying; public string Color { get { if (_bpm < 100) { return "indigo"; } if (_bpm < 125) { return "teal"; } if (_bpm < 140) return "green"; if (_bpm < 175) return "orange"; return "red"; } } public string AnimationDuration => $"{60 / _bpm}s"; public void Decrement() { _bpm--; } public void Increment() { _bpm++; } public void Toggle() { _isPlaying = !_isPlaying; } }

DemoList.Name: appendTextField
DemoList.Title: 追加文本字段
DemoList.Description: 滑块可以与它的 AppendContent**** 插槽中的其他组件合并，例如 MTextField，以便为组件添加额外的功能。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard class="e4">
    <MResponsive Style="@($"background: rgb({_red}, {_green}, {_blue})")"
                 Height="@("300px")"></MResponsive>

    <MCardText>
        <MContainer Fluid>
            <MRow>
                <MCol Cols="12">
                    <MSlider @bind-Value="_red"
                             Max="255"
                             Label="R"
                             Class="align-center">
                        <AppendContent>
                            <MTextField @bind-Value="_red"
                                        Class="mt-0 pt-0"
                                        Type="number"
                                        Style="width: 60px"></MTextField>
                        </AppendContent>
                    </MSlider>
                </MCol>

                <MCol Cols="12">
                    <MSlider @bind-Value="_green"
                             Max="255"
                             Label="G"
                             Class="align-center">
                        <AppendContent>
                            <MTextField @bind-Value="_green"
                                        Class="mt-0 pt-0"
                                        Type="number"
                                        Style="width: 60px"></MTextField>
                        </AppendContent>
                    </MSlider>
                </MCol>

                <MCol Cols="12">
                    <MSlider @bind-Value="_blue"
                             Max="255"
                             Label="B"
                             Class="align-center">
                        <AppendContent>
                            <MTextField @bind-Value="_blue"
                                        Class="mt-0 pt-0"
                                        Type="number"
                                        Style="width: 60px"></MTextField>
                        </AppendContent>
                    </MSlider>
                </MCol>
            </MRow>
        </MContainer>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

  @code {
    private double _red = 64;
    private double _green = 128;
    private double _blue = 0;
  }

Subtitle: 滑块
Title: Sliders

Desc: MSwitch 组件使用户能够在两个不同的值之间进行选择。 它们非常类似于一个切换，或开关，虽然视觉上不同于一个复选框。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: 最简单形式的 MSwitch 提供两个值之间的切换。
DemoList.Code: @code{ private bool _show = true; }

DemoList.Name: color
DemoList.Title: 颜色
DemoList.Description: 开关可以使用任何内置颜色和上下文名称使用 Color 属性进行着色。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Flat>
    <MCardText>
        <MContainer Fluid>
            <MRow>
                <MCol Cols="12"
                      Sm="4"
                      Md="4">
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex1"
                             Label="red"
                             Color="red"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex2"
                             Label="red darken-3"
                             Color="red darken-3"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                </MCol>
                <MCol Cols="12"
                      Sm="4"
                      Md="4">
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex3"
                             Label="indigo"
                             Color="indigo"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex4"
                             Label="indigo darken-3"
                             Color="indigo darken-3"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                </MCol>
                <MCol Cols="12"
                      Sm="4"
                      Md="4">
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex5"
                             Label="orange"
                             Color="orange"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex6"
                             Label="orange darken-3"
                             Color="orange darken-3"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                </MCol>
            </MRow>

            <MRow Class="mt-12">
                <MCol Cols="12"
                      Sm="4"
                      Md="4">
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex7"
                             Label="primary"
                             Color="primary"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex8"
                             Label="secondary"
                             Color="secondary"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                </MCol>
                <MCol Cols="12"
                      Sm="4"
                      Md="4">
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex9"
                             Label="success"
                             Color="success"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex10"
                             Label="info"
                             Color="info"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                </MCol>
                <MCol Cols="12"
                      Sm="4"
                      Md="4">
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex11"
                             Label="warning"
                             Color="warning"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_ex12"
                             Label="error"
                             Color="error"
                             HideDetails="true"></MSwitch>
                </MCol>
            </MRow>
        </MContainer>
    </MCardText>
</MCard>

@code {
    private bool _ex1 = true;
    private bool _ex2 = true;
    private bool _ex3 = true;
    private bool _ex4 = true;
    private bool _ex5 = true;
    private bool _ex6 = true;
    private bool _ex7 = true;
    private bool _ex8 = true;
    private bool _ex9 = true;
    private bool _ex10 = true;
    private bool _ex11 = true;
    private bool _ex12 = true;
}

DemoList.Name: flat

         Height="@("100%")"
         Class="pa-12">
    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_switch1"
              Flat
              Label="@string.Format("Switch 1: {0}",_switch1)"></MSwitch>
    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_switch2"
              Flat
              Label="@string.Format("Switch 2: {0}",_switch2)"></MSwitch>
</MSheet>

@code{
    private bool _switch1=true;
    private bool _switch2;
}

    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_switch1"
              Inset
              Label="@string.Format("Switch 1: {0}",_switch1)"></MSwitch>
    <MSwitch @bind-Value="_switch2"
              Inset
              Label="@string.Format("Switch 2: {0}",_switch2)"></MSwitch>
</MSheet>

@code{
    private bool _switch1=true;
    private bool _switch2;
}

DemoList.Name: state
DemoList.Title: 状态
DemoList.Description: MSwitch 可以有不同的状态，例如default，Disabled，以及 Loading。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer fluid>
    <MRow Class="dark--text">
        <MCol Cols="6">
            on
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            off
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MSwitch
                Color="primary"
                @bind-Value="switch1">
            </MSwitch>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MSwitch Color="primary"></MSwitch>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
    <MRow Class="dark--text">
        <MCol Cols="6">
            on disabled
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            off disabled
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MSwitch
                Color="primary"
                @bind-Value="switch2"
                Disabled>
            </MSwitch>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MSwitch Disabled></MSwitch>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
    <MRow Class="dark--text">
        <MCol Cols="6">
            on loading
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            off loading
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MSwitch
                Loading="warning"
                @bind-Value="switch3">
            </MSwitch>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MSwitch Loading="warning"></MSwitch>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

@code {
    bool switch1 = true;
    bool switch2 = true;
    bool switch3 = true;
    StringBoolean warning = "warning";
}

DemoList.Name: label

@code {

DemoList.Name: customText
DemoList.Title: 自定义文本
DemoList.Description: switch可以自定义文本
DemoList.Code: @code { private bool _show = true; }

Subtitle: 开关
Title: Switches

Desc: 多行文本框组件用于收集大量文本数据。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: MTextarea 最简单的形式是多行文本字段，对于大量文本非常有用。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MRow>
        <MCol
            Cols="12"
            Md="6">
            <MTextarea
                Name="input-7-1"
                Label="Default style"
                @bind-Value="value1"
                Hint="Hint text">
            </MTextarea>
        </MCol>
        <MCol
            Cols="12"
            Md="6">
            <MTextarea
                Solo
                Name="input-7-4"
                Label="Solo textarea">
            </MTextarea>
        </MCol>
        <MCol
            Cols="12"
            Md="6">
            <MTextarea
                Filled
                Name="input-7-4"
                Label="Filled textarea"
                @bind-Value="value3">
            </MTextarea>
        </MCol>
        <MCol
            Cols="12"
            Md="6">
            <MTextarea
                Outlined
                Name="input-7-4"
                Label="Outlined textarea"
                @bind-Value="value4">
            </MTextarea>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

@code {
    string value1 = "The Woodman set to work at once, and so sharp was his axe that the tree was soon chopped nearly through.";
    string value3 = "The Woodman set to work at once, and so sharp was his axe that the tree was soon chopped nearly through.";
    string value4 = "The Woodman set to work at once, and so sharp was his axe that the tree was soon chopped nearly through.";
}

DemoList.Name: autoGrow
DemoList.Title: 自动增长
DemoList.Description: 当使用 AutoGrow 时，当包含的文本超过其大小时，多行文本框的大小将自动增加。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MTextarea Filled
               Label="Label"
               AutoGrow
               @bind-Value="_value">
    </MTextarea>
</MContainer>

@code{
    private string _value = "The Woodman set to work at once, and so sharp was his axe that the tree was soon chopped nearly through.";
}

DemoList.Name: clearable
DemoList.Title: 可清除
DemoList.Description: 您可以使用 Clearable 从 MTextarea 清除文本，并使用 ClearableIcon 自定义清除图标。

    <MTextarea Clearable
               ClearIcon="mdi-close-circle"
               Label="Text"
               @bind-Value="_value">
    </MTextarea>
</MContainer>

@code{
    private string _value = "This is clearable text.";
}

DemoList.Name: counter
DemoList.Title: 计数器
DemoList.Description: Counter 通知用户 MTextarea 的字符限制。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MTextarea Counter="true"
               Label="Text"
               Rules="_rules"
               @bind-Value="_value">
    </MTextarea>
</MContainer>

@code {

            v => v.Length <= 25 ? true : "Max 25 characters"
        };
}

DemoList.Name: counter
DemoList.Title: 计数器
DemoList.Description: 使用 Counter 通知用户字符限制。计数器本身不执行任何验证—您需要将其与内部验证系统或第三方库配对。计数器可以定制 CounterValue 和 CounterContent。
DemoList.Code:
@using BlazorComponent

<MForm Context="editContext">
    <MContainer>
        <MRow>
            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_title"
                            Counter="25"
                            Rules="_rules"
                            Hint="This field uses counter prop"
                            Label="Regular"></MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_description"
                            Counter="25"
                            Rules="_rules"
                            Hint="This field uses maxlength attribute"
                            Label="Limit exceeded"></MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_title"
                            Counter="5"
                            Rules="_wordsRules"
                            Hint="This field counts words instead of characters"
                            CounterValue="v=>v.Trim().Split(' ').Length"
                            Label="Custom counter from prop"></MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_title"
                            Counter="true"
                            Rules="_wordsRules"
                            Hint="This field counts words instead of characters"
                            Label="Custom counter from slot">
                    <CounterContent>
                        <MCounter Max="5" Value="_title.Trim().Split(' ').Length"></MCounter>
                    </CounterContent>
                </MTextField>
            </MCol>
        </MRow>
    </MContainer>
</MForm>

@code {
    private string _title = "Preliminary report";
    private string _description = "California is a state in the western United States";
    private List<Func<string, StringBoolean>> _rules = new()
        {
            v => v.Length <= 25 ? true : "Max 25 characters"
        };
    private List<Func<string, StringBoolean>> _wordsRules = new()
        {
            v => v.Trim().Split(' ').Length <= 5 ? true : "Max 5 words"
        };
}

Mauris massa. Vestibulum lacinia arcu eget nulla. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Curabitur sodales ligula in libero. Sed dignissim lacinia nunc."; Model model = new(); bool FormIsValid => form != null && form.EditContext.IsModified() && form.EditContext.Validate(); async Task ResetForm() { await form.ResetAsync(); } async Task Submit() { snackbar = true; await form.ResetAsync(); } public class Model { [Required] public string First { get; set; } [Required] public string Last { get; set; } [Required] [Range(0, 10, ErrorMessage = "I don't believe you!")] public double Age { get; set; } public string Bio { get; set; } [Required] public string FavoriteAnimal { get; set; } [Required] [Range(typeof(bool), "true", "true", ErrorMessage = "The field is required")] // just for demo public bool Terms { get; set; } } }

DemoList.Name: prefixesAndSuffixes
DemoList.Title: 前缀和后缀
DemoList.Description: Prefix 和 Suffix 属性允许您在文本字段旁边添加和附加不可更改的内联文本。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Fluid>
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="4">
            <MSubheader>Prefix for dollar currency</MSubheader>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="8">
            <MTextField Label="Amount"
                          Value="10.00"
                          Prefix="$"></MTextField>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>

    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="4">
            <MSubheader>Suffix for weight</MSubheader>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="8">
            <MTextField Label="Weight"
                          Value="28.00"
                          Suffix="lbs"></MTextField>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>

    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="4">
            <MSubheader>Suffix for email domain</MSubheader>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="8">
            <MTextField Label="Email address"
                          Value="@("example")"
                          Suffix="@("@gmail.com")"></MTextField>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>

    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="4">
            <MSubheader>Suffix for time zone</MSubheader>
        </MCol>
        <MCol Cols="8">
            <MTextField Label="Label Text"
                          Value="@("12:30:00")"
                          Type="time"
                          Suffix="PST"></MTextField>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

DemoList.Name: shaped
DemoList.Title: 形状
DemoList.Description: Shaped 文本字段如果是 Outlined 则是圆角的；如果是 Filled，则具有更大的 border-radius。
DemoList.Code:
<MForm>
    <MContainer>
        <MRow>
            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_first"
                            Label="First Name"
                            Outlined

DemoList.Name: validation
DemoList.Title: 验证
DemoList.Description: MASA Blazor 包括通过 规则 prop 进行简单的验证。 prop 接受了各种类型 函数, 布尔值 和 字符串 的组合。 当输入值发生变化时，数组中的每个元素将被验证。 函数传递当前的 Value 作为参数，必须返回 true / false 或 字符串 包含错误消息。
DemoList.Code:
<MForm>
    <MContainer>
        <MRow>
            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_title"
                            Rules="_titleRules"
                            Label="Title"
                            Counter="true"
                            maxlength="20"></MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="6">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_email"
                            Rules="_emailRules"
                            Label="E-mail"></MTextField>
            </MCol>
        </MRow>
    </MContainer>
</MForm>

  @code {
    private string _title = "Preliminary report";
    private string _email = "";
    private Func<string, StringBoolean> _requiredRule = value => !string.IsNullOrEmpty(value) ? true : "Required.";
    private Func<string, StringBoolean> _counterRule = value => value.Length <= 20 ? true : "Max 20 characters";
    private Func<string, StringBoolean> _emailRule = value => System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(value, "^[\\w-]+@[\\w-]+\\.(com|net|org|edu|mil|tv|biz|info)$").Success ? true : "Invalid e-mail.";
    private IEnumerable<Func<string, StringBoolean>> _titleRules => new List<Func<string, StringBoolean>>
        {
            _requiredRule,
            _counterRule
        };
    private IEnumerable<Func<string, StringBoolean>> _emailRules => new List<Func<string, StringBoolean>>
        {
            _requiredRule,
            _emailRule
        };
  }

DemoList.Name: iconEvents
DemoList.Title: 图标事件
DemoList.Description: OnPrependClick, OnAppendClick, OnAppendOuterClick 和 OnClearClick 将在点击相应的图标时发出。 请注意，如果使用图标插槽，将不会触发这些事件。
DemoList.Code:
<MForm>
    <MContainer>
        <MRow>
            <MCol Cols="12">
                <MTextField @bind-Value="_message"
                            AppendIcon="@(_marker ? "mdi-map-marker" : "mdi-map-marker-off")"
                            AppendOuterIcon="@(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_message) ? "mdi-send" : "mdi-microphone")"
                            PrependIcon="@Icon"
                            Filled
                            ClearIcon="mdi-close-circle"
                            Clearable
                            Label="Message"
                            Type="text"
                            OnAppendClick="ToggleMarker"
                            OnAppendOuterClick="SendMessage"
                            OnClearClick="ClearMessage"
                            OnPrependClick="ChangeIcon">
                </MTextField>
            </MCol>
        </MRow>
    </MContainer>
</MForm>

@code {
    private string _message = "Hey!";
    private bool _marker = true;

    private List<string> _icons = new List<string>
    {
        "mdi-emoticon",
        "mdi-emoticon-cool",
        "mdi-emoticon-dead",
        "mdi-emoticon-excited",
        "mdi-emoticon-happy",
        "mdi-emoticon-neutral",
        "mdi-emoticon-sad",
        "mdi-emoticon-tongue",
    };

    private int _iconIndex = 0;

    public string Icon => _icons[_iconIndex];

    public void ToggleMarker()
    {
        _marker = !_marker;
    }

    public void ChangeIcon()
    {
        if (_iconIndex == _icons.Count - 1)
        {
            _iconIndex = 0;
        }
        else
        {
            _iconIndex++;
        }
    }

    public void SendMessage()
    {
        _iconIndex = 0;
        _message = "";
    }

    public void ClearMessage()
    {
        _message = "";
    }

}

DemoList.Name: passwordInput
DemoList.Title: 密码输入
DemoList.Description: 使用password类型可以与附加图标和回调一起使用，以控制可见性。
DemoList.Code:
@using System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
<MForm EnableValidation Model="_model">
    <MContainer Fluid>
        <MRow>
            <MCol
                Cols="12"
                Sm="6">
                <MTextField
                    @bind-Value="_model.Password1"
                    AppendIcon="@(_show1 ? "mdi-eye" : "mdi-eye-off")"
                    Type="@(_show1 ? "text" : "password")"
                    Label="Normal with Hint text"
                    Hint="At least 8 characters"
                    Counter="true"
                    OnAppendClick="() => _show1 = !_show1">
                </MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol
                Cols="12"
                Sm="6">
                <MTextField
                    @bind-Value="_model.Password2"
                    AppendIcon="@(_show2 ? "mdi-eye" : "mdi-eye-off")"
                    Type="@(_show2 ? "text" : "password")"
                    Label="Visible"
                    Hint="At least 8 characters"
                    Class="input-group--focused"
                    OnAppendClick="() => _show2 = !_show2">
                </MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol
                Cols="12"
                Sm="6">
                <MTextField
                    @bind-Value="_model.Password3"
                    AppendIcon="@(_show3 ? "mdi-eye" : "mdi-eye-off")"
                    Type="@(_show3 ? "text" : "password")"
                    Label="Not visible"
                    Hint="At least 8 characters"
                    OnAppendClick="() => _show3 = !_show3">
                </MTextField>
            </MCol>

            <MCol
                Cols="12"
                Sm="6">
                <MTextField
                    @bind-Value="_model.Password4"
                    AppendIcon="@(_show4 ? "mdi-eye" : "mdi-eye-off")"
                    Type="@(_show4 ? "text" : "password")"
                    Label="Error"
                    Hint="At least 8 characters"
                    OnAppendClick="() => _show4 = !_show4">
                </MTextField>
            </MCol>
        </MRow>
    </MContainer>
</MForm>

@code{
    private bool _show1 = false;
    private bool _show2 = true;
    private bool _show3 = false;
    private bool _show4 = false;
    private Model _model = new()
    {
        Password1 = "Password",
        Password2 = "wqfasds",
        Password3 = "wqfasds",
        Password4 = "Pa"
    };

    public class Model
    {
        [Required(ErrorMessage ="Required.")]
        [MinLength(8,ErrorMessage ="Min 8 characters")]
        public string Password1 { get; set; }
        [Required(ErrorMessage ="Required.")]
        [MinLength(8,ErrorMessage ="Min 8 characters")]
        public string Password2 { get; set; }
        [Required(ErrorMessage ="Required.")]
        [MinLength(8,ErrorMessage ="Min 8 characters")]
        public string Password3 { get; set; }
        [Required(ErrorMessage ="Required.")]
        public string Password4 { get; set; }
    }
}

Subtitle: 文本框
Title: Text fields

Desc:
Masa.Blazor 配备了一个使用 flexbox 构建的 12 格网格系统。 网格用于在应用的内容中创建特定的布局。 它包含 5 种类型的媒体断点，用于针对特定的屏幕尺寸或方向，xs、sm、md、lg 和 xl。 这些分辨率在视口断点表中定义如下，可以通过自定义断点进行修改。

Material Design 断点
设备 代码 类型 像素范围
Extra small (超小号) xs 小型号到大型号的手机 < 600px
Small (小号) sm 小型号到中型号的平板 600px > < 960px
Medium (中号) md 大型号平板到手提电脑 960px > < 1264px*
Large (大号) lg 桌面端 1264px > < 1904px*
Extra large (超大号) xl 4K 和超宽屏幕 > 1904px*
桌面端上浏览器滚动条的宽度为 * -16px
规格

OtherDocs.子组件:
• MContainer：MContainer 提供了将你的网站内容居中和水平填充的功能。 你还可以使用 Fluid 属性将容器在所有视口和设备尺寸上完全扩展。
  • MCol：MCol 包裹内容，它必须是 MRow 的直接子集。
  • MRow：MRow 是 MCol 的容器组件。 它使用 Flex 属性来控制其内栏的布局和流。 它使用的是 24px 的标准间隔。 这可以用 Dense 属性来减小，或者用 NoGutters 来完全去除。
  • MSpacer：MSpacer 是一个基本而又通用的间隔组件，用于分配父子组件之间的剩余宽度。 当一个 MSpacer 放置在子组件之前或之后时，组件将推到其容器的左右两侧。 当多个组件之间使用多个 MSpacer 时，剩余的宽度将均匀地分布在每个 spacer 之间。
OtherDocs.辅助类: FillHeight将height:100%应用于元素。当应用于MContainer时，它还包括align items:center。
OtherDocs.注意:
1.x 网格系统已被废弃，请改用 2.x 网格系统。 1.x 网格的文档可以在 v1.5 文档 中找到。

网格组件上基于断点的属性以 andUp 的方式工作。 考虑 xs 断点已经被删除的情况， 这将会影响到 offset、justify、align 和 MCol 上的断点属性。

  • 像 justify-sm 和 justify-md 这样的属性仍然存在，但 justify-xs 会变成 justify。
  • MCol 上不存在 xs 属性。 与此对应的是 cols 属性。

当在 IE11 使用网格系统时，你需要设置一个显式的 height，因为 min-height 不足进而导致非预期结果。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: Masa.Blazor 网格深受 Bootstrap 网格 的启发。 它使用一系列的容器、行、列来整合内容的布局和排列。 如果你不熟悉 flexbox，阅读 CSS Tricks flexbox 指南，了解背景、术语、指南和代码片段。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Class="grey lighten-5">
    <MRow NoGutters>
        @for (var i = 0; i < 3; i++)
        {
            <MCol Cols="12"
                  Sm="4">
                <MCard Class="pa-2"
                       Outlined
                       tile>
                    One of three columns
                </MCard>
            </MCol>
        }
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

DemoList.Name: align
DemoList.Title: 垂直对齐
DemoList.Description: 使用 Align 和 AlignSelf 属性来改变 flex 项目及其父项的垂直对齐方式。
DemoList.Code:
@foreach (var align in _alignments) { @for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) { One of three columns } } @foreach (var align in _alignments) { One of three columns }
@code{ private string[] _alignments = new string[] { "start", "center", "end" }; }

DemoList.Name: breakpointSizing
DemoList.Title: 断点尺寸
DemoList.Description: 列将自动占用其父容器内相等的空间。 这可以使用 Cols 属性来修改。 你还可以使用 Sm、Md、Lg 和 Xl 属性来进一步定义不同视口尺寸下的列占用空间。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Class="grey lighten-5">
    @for (int i = 1; i <= 2; i++)
    {
        var n = i + 1;
        <MRow Class="@(i == 1 ? "mb-6" : null)"
              NoGutters>
            @for (int j = 0; j < n + 1; j++)
            {
                var k = j + 1;
                <MCol>
                    <MCard Class="pa-2"
                           Outlined
                           tile>
                        @($"{ k } of { n + 1 }")
                    </MCard>
                </MCol>
            }
        </MRow>
    }
</MContainer>

DemoList.Name: justify

<MContainer Class="grey lighten-5">
    @foreach (var j in _justify)
    {
        <MRow Justify="@j">

                    <MCard Class="pa-2"
                           Outlined
                           tile>
                        One of two columns
                    </MCard>
                </MCol>
            }
        </MRow>
    }
</MContainer>

@code{

}

.col-9 .col-4
Since 9 + 4 = 13 > 12, this 4-column-wide div gets wrapped onto a new line as one contiguous unit. .col-6
Subsequent columns continue along the new line.

DemoList.Name: spacers
DemoList.Title: 空白
DemoList.Description: MSpacer 组件在你想要填充可用空间或在两个组件之间留出空间时非常有用。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Class="grey lighten-5">
    <MRow>
        <MCol>
            <MCard Class="pa-2"
                   Outlined
                   tile>
                .col
            </MCard>
        </MCol>
        <MSpacer></MSpacer>
        <MCol>
            <MCard Class="pa-2"
                   Outlined
                   tile>
                .col
            </MCard>
        </MCol>

    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="@("auto")"
              Lg="3">
            <MCard Class="pa-2"
                   Outlined
                   tile>
                .col-auto
            </MCard>
        </MCol>

DemoList.Name: wysiwyg
DemoList.Title: WYSIWYG/所见即所得
DemoList.Description: 对类似的操作进行分组，并设计自己的 WYSIWYG 组件。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard
    MaxWidth="400"
    Class="mx-auto">
    <MTextarea
        @bind-Value="value"
        AutoGrow
        FullWidth
        Rows="2">
    </MTextarea>

    <MRow
        Class="px-2 pb-2 ma-0"
        Justify="JustifyTypes.SpaceBetween">
        <MButtonGroup
            @bind-Values="formatting"
            multiple>
            <MButton>
                <MIcon>mdi-format-italic</MIcon>
            </MButton>

            <MButton>
                <MIcon>mdi-format-bold</MIcon>
            </MButton>

            <MButton>
                <MIcon>mdi-format-underline</MIcon>
            </MButton>

            <MButton>
                <MRow
                    Align="AlignTypes.Center"
                    Class="flex-column"
                    Justify="JustifyTypes.Center">
                    <MIcon Class="cols 12">
                        mdi-format-color-text
                    </MIcon>

                    <MSheet
                        Tile
                        Style="margin-top: -4px;"
                        Height="4"
                        Width="26"
                        Color="purple">
                    </MSheet>
                </MRow>
            </MButton>
        </MButtonGroup>

        <MButtonGroup @bind-Value="alignment">
            <MButton>
                <MIcon>mdi-format-align-center</MIcon>
            </MButton>

            <MButton>
                <MIcon>mdi-format-align-left</MIcon>
            </MButton>

            <MButton>
                <MIcon>mdi-format-align-right</MIcon>
            </MButton>
        </MButtonGroup>
    </MRow>

    <MSheet
        Class="pa-4 text-center"
        Tile>
        <MRow
            Class="mb-2"
            Dense>
            @foreach (var n in numbers)
            {
                <MCol Class="text-caption grey--text text--darken-1">@n</MCol>
            }

        </MRow>

        <MRow dense>
            @foreach (var l in letters)
            {
                <MCol Class="text-h6 grey--text font-weight-regular text--darken-2">@l</MCol>
            }
        </MRow>
    </MSheet>
</MCard>


@code {

    StringNumber alignment = 1;
    List<StringNumber> formatting = new();
    List<int> numbers = new() {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 0};
    List<string> letters = "q w e r t y u i o p".Split(" ").ToList();
    string value = "Toggle button requirements.\r\rHave at least three toggle buttons in a group\rLabel buttons with text, an icon, or";

}

Subtitle: 按钮组

    <MChipGroup ActiveClass="primary--text"
                Column>
        @foreach (var tag in _tags)
        {
            <MChip>
                @tag
            </MChip>
        }
    </MChipGroup>
</MRow>

@code {

        "Home Improvement",
        "Vacation",
        "Food",
        "Drawers",

        "Art",
        "Tech",

        };
}

Subtitle: 纸片组
Title: Chip groups

Desc: MItemGroup 提供从任何组件中创建一组可选项的功能。 这是 MTabs 和 Mcarousel 等组件的基本功能。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: MItemGroup 的核心用法是创建由 Value 控制的任何对象的组。
DemoList.Code:
<MItemGroup>
    <MContainer>
        <MRow>
            @foreach (var i in Enumerable.Range(0, 3))
            {
                <MCol Cols="4" @key="i">
                    <MItem>
                        @{
                            <MCard Class="d-flex align-center" 
                                   Color="@(context.Active ? "primary" : "")"
                                   OnClick="context.Toggle" 
                                   Dark 
                                   Height="200">
                                <ScrollYTransition>
                                    <ShowTransitionElement Value="context.Active" Class="text-h2 flex-grow-1 text-center">
                                        Active
                                    </ShowTransitionElement>
                                </ScrollYTransition>
                            </MCard>
                        }
                    </MItem>
                </MCol>
            }
        </MRow>
    </MContainer>
</MItemGroup>

DemoList.Name: activeClass

                            Height="200"
                            OnClick="context.Toggle"
                            RefBack="context.Ref">
                            <ScrollYTransition>
                                <ShowTransitionElement Value="context.Active" Class="text-h2 flex-grow-1 text-center">
                                    Active
                                </ShowTransitionElement>
                            </ScrollYTransition>
                        </MCard>
                    </MItem>
                </MCol>
            }
        </MRow>
    </MContainer>
</MItemGroup>

DemoList.Name: chips
DemoList.Title: Chips（纸片）
DemoList.Description: 轻松绑定自定义纸片组。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard>
    <MToolbar Flat Color="blue-grey" Dark>
        <MToolbarTitle>Submit a post</MToolbarTitle>
    </MToolbar>

    <MCardText>
        <MTextField Filled Label="Title" TValue="string" @bind-Value="@title"></MTextField>

        <MCardActions>

            <MButton Color="success" Depressed>Post</MButton>
        </MCardActions>

</MCard>

@code {

Subtitle: 项目组
Title: Item groups

Desc: MListItemGroup 提供创建一组可选择的 MListItem 的能力。MListItemGroup 组件利用其核心的 MItemGroup 来为交互式列表提供一个简洁的接口。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: 默认情况下，ListItemGroup 操作类似于 ItemGroup 。如果没有提供 Value，则该群组将基于其索引提供默认值。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Class="mx-auto" MaxWidth="500">
    <MList>
        <MListItemGroup @bind-Value="selected">
            @foreach (var item in items)
            {
                <MListItem @key="@item">
                    <MListItemIcon>
                        <MIcon>@item.Icon</MIcon>
                    </MListItemIcon>
                    <MListItemContent>
                        <MListItemTitle>@item.Text</MListItemTitle>
                    </MListItemContent>
                </MListItem>
            }
        </MListItemGroup>
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code {

    static readonly Item[] items =
    {
        new()
        {
            Icon = "mdi-inbox",
            Text = "Inbox"
        },
        new()
        {
            Icon = "mdi-star",
            Text = "Star"
        },
        new()
        {
            Icon = "mdi-send",
            Text = "Send"
        },
        new()
        {
            Icon = "mdi-email-open",
            Text = "Drafts"
        }
    };

    StringNumber selected = 1;

    public class Item
    {
        public string Icon { get; set; }
        public string Text { get; set; }
    }

}

DemoList.Name: flatList
DemoList.Title: 扁平列表
DemoList.Description: 您可以轻松禁用所选 MListItem 的默认高亮显示。 这为用户的选择创建了一个较低的配置文件。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard
    Class="mx-auto"
    MaxWidth="400">
    <MList Flat>
        <MListItemGroup
            @bind-Value="model"
            Color="indigo">
            @foreach (var item in items)
            {
                <MListItem @key="item">
                    <MListItemIcon>
                        <MIcon>@item.icon</MIcon>
                    </MListItemIcon>

                    <MListItemContent>
                        <MListItemTitle>@item.text</MListItemTitle>
                    </MListItemContent>
                </MListItem>
            }
        </MListItemGroup>
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code {

DemoList.Name: selectionControls
DemoList.Title: 选择控件
DemoList.Description: 使用默认插槽，您可以访问项目内部状态并进行切换。 因为 Active 属性是一个布尔值, 我们使用复选框上的 IsActive prop 将其状态链接到 MListItem。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard
    Class="mx-auto"
    MaxWidth="500">
    <MList Shaped>
        <MListItemGroup
            @bind-Values="model"
            Multiple>
            @foreach (var (item,i) in items.Select((v, i) => (v,i)))
            {
                if (item == "")
                {
                    <MDivider @key="@($"divider-{i}")"></MDivider>
                }
                else
                {
                    <MListItem @key="@($"item-{i}")" Value="item" ActiveClass="deep-purple--text text--accent-4">
                        <ItemContent>
                            <MListItemContent>
                                <MListItemTitle>@item</MListItemTitle>
                            </MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemAction>
                                <MCheckbox Value="@context.Active" Color="deep-purple accent-4"></MCheckbox>
                            </MListItemAction>
                        </ItemContent>
                    </MListItem>
                }
            }
        </MListItemGroup>
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code {

    List<string> items = new()
    {
        "Dog Photos",
        "Cat Photos",
        "",
        "Potatoes",
        "Carrots",
    };

    List<StringNumber> model = new() {"Carrots"};

}

Subtitle: 列表项目组
Title: List item groups

Desc: MSlideGroup 组件用于显示伪分页信息。它以 MItemGroup 为核心，为 MTabs 和 MChipGroup 等组件提供基础。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: 类似于 MWindow 组件，MSideGroup 允许项目根据需要占用尽可能多的空间，允许用户在提供的信息中水平移动。
DemoList.Code:
<MSheet Class="mx-auto" MaxWidth="700">
    <MSlideGroup Multiple ShowArrows="@(true)">
        @foreach (var item in Enumerable.Range(1, 25))
        {
            <MSlideItem>
                <MButton Class="mx-2"
                         IsActive="@context.Active"
                         ActiveClass="purple white--text"
                         Depressed
                         Rounded
                         OnClick="@context.Toggle"
                         RefBack="@context.Ref">
                    Options @item
                </MButton>
            </MSlideItem>
        }
    </MSlideGroup>
</MSheet>

DemoList.Name: activeClass
DemoList.Title: 激活类
DemoList.Description: ActiveClass 属性允许您在激活的项上设置自定义的 CSS 类。
DemoList.Code:
<MSheet Class="mx-auto" MaxWidth="800" Elevation="8">
    <MSlideGroup ShowArrows="@(true)" Class="pa-4" ActiveClass="success">
        @foreach (var item in Enumerable.Range(1, 15))
        {
            <MSlideItem>
                <MCard Color="@(context.Active ? "primary" : "grey lighten-1")"
                       Class="@($"ma-4 {context.ActiveClass}")"
                       Height="200"
                       Width="100"
                       OnClick="@context.Toggle"
                       RefBack="@context.Ref">
                    <MRow Class="fill-height" Align="AlignTypes.Center" Justify="JustifyTypes.Center">
                        <ScaleTransition>
                            <ShowTransitionElement Value="context.Active">
                                <MIcon Color="white" Size="48">mdi-close-circle-outline</MIcon>
                            </ShowTransitionElement>
                        </ScaleTransition>
                    </MRow>
                </MCard>
            </MSlideItem>
        }
    </MSlideGroup>
</MSheet>

DemoList.Name: onboarding
DemoList.Title: 新手教学
DemoList.Description: MWindow 使创建自定义组件（如不同样式的幻灯片）变得很轻松。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Color="black" Dark Flat Tile>
    <MWindow @bind-Value="OnBoarding">
        @foreach (var item in Enumerable.Range(0, length))
        {
            <MWindowItem Value="item">
                <MCard Color="transparent" Height="200">
                    <MRow Class="fill-height" Align="AlignTypes.Center" Justify="JustifyTypes.Center">
                        <MCardText Class="text-center">
                            Transparent themed, for background-imaged slides. Background color black added for demonstration purposes.
                        </MCardText>
                    </MRow>
                </MCard>
            </MWindowItem>
        }
    </MWindow>

    <MCardActions Class="justify-space-between">
        <MButton
            Text
            OnClick="Prev">
            <MIcon>mdi-chevron-left</MIcon>
        </MButton>
        <MItemGroup
            @bind-Value="OnBoarding"
            Class="text-center"
            Mandatory>
            @foreach (var item in Enumerable.Range(0, length))
            {
                <MItem Value="item">
                    <MButton
                        IsActive="@context.Active"
                        Icon
                        OnClick="context.Toggle">
                        <MIcon>mdi-record</MIcon>
                    </MButton>
                </MItem>
            }
        </MItemGroup>
        <MButton
            Text
            OnClick="Next">
            <MIcon>mdi-chevron-right</MIcon>
        </MButton>
    </MCardActions>
</MCard>

@code {

    
    int onboarding = 0;

    StringNumber OnBoarding
    {
        get => onboarding;
        set => onboarding = value.AsT1;
    }

    int length = 3;

    private void Next()
    {
        onboarding = onboarding + 1 == length ? 0 : onboarding + 1;
    }

    private void Prev()
    {
        onboarding = onboarding - 1 < 0 ? length - 1 : onboarding - 1;
    }

}

    <MCol Cols="12" Sm="6">
        <MHover OpenDelay="200">
            <MCard @attributes="context.Attrs" Class="@($"mx-auto {context.Class}")" Elevation="@(context.Hover ? 16 : 2)" Height="350" MaxWidth="350">
                <MCardText Class="font-weight-medium mt-12 text-center text-subtitle-1">
                    Open Delay (Mouse enter)
                </MCardText>
            </MCard>

    </MCol>

    <MCol Cols="12" Sm="6">
        <MHover CloseDelay="200">
            <MCard @attributes="context.Attrs" Class="@($"mx-auto {context.Class}")" Elevation="@(context.Hover ? 16 : 2)" Height="350" MaxWidth="350">
                <MCardText Class="font-weight-medium mt-12 text-center text-subtitle-1">
                    Close Delay (Mouse leave)
                </MCardText>
            </MCard>
        </MHover>
    </MCol>
</MRow>

<style>

Title: Icons

Desc: MImage组件包含支持丰富媒体的功能。

OtherDocs.注意: MImage 组件使用 Intersect 指令，IE11 和 Safari需要 Polyfill。 如果检测到浏览器不支持此功能, 图像仍将以正常方式加载。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: MImage 组件用于显示具有延迟加载和占位符的响应图像。
DemoList.Code:
<MRow Justify="@JustifyTypes.Center">
    <MImage MaxHeight="150"
            MaxWidth="250"
            Src="@_src"
            LazySrc="https://picsum.photos/id/11/10/6">
    </MImage>
</MRow>

@code {
    private string _src = "https://picsum.photos/id/11/500/300";
}

DemoList.Name: aspectRatio
DemoList.Title: 宽高比
DemoList.Description: 如果你想改变图像的长宽比，你可以设置一个固定的宽高比。
DemoList.Code: @code { private double _width = 300; }

DemoList.Name: contain
DemoList.Title: 包含
DemoList.Description: 如果提供的长宽比与实际图像不匹配，则默认行为是填充尽可能多的空间，裁剪图像的边。启用 Contain 属性可以防止这种情况，但会导致两边出现空白。
DemoList.Code:
Default (cover)
Matching
Too high
Too low
Contain
Matching
Too high
Too low

DemoList.Name: gradients
DemoList.Title: 渐变
DemoList.Description: Gradient 属性可用于对图像应用简单的渐变叠加。更复杂的渐变应该作为一个class写在内容插槽上。

DemoList.Name: height
DemoList.Title: 高度
DemoList.Description: MImage 将自动增长到 Src 的大小，保持正确的纵横比。你可以用Height和MaxHeight的属性来限制。
DemoList.Code:
<MContainer Class="fill-height"
            Fluid
            Style="min-height: 434px">
    <MRow>
        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MCard>
                <MImage Src="https://picsum.photos/350/165?random"
                        Height="125"
                        Class="grey darken-4"></MImage>
                <MCardTitle Class="text-h6">
                    height
                </MCardTitle>
            </MCard>
        </MCol>

        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MCard>
                <MImage Src="https://picsum.photos/350/165?random"
                        Height="125"
                        Contain
                        Class="grey darken-4"></MImage>
                <MCardTitle Class="text-h6">
                    height with contain
                </MCardTitle>
            </MCard>
        </MCol>

        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MCard>
                <MImage Src="https://picsum.photos/350/165?random"
                        MaxHeight="125"
                        Class="grey darken-4"></MImage>
                <MCardTitle Class="text-h6">
                    max-height
                </MCardTitle>
            </MCard>
        </MCol>

        <MCol Cols="6">
            <MCard>
                <MImage Src="https://picsum.photos/350/165?random"
                        MaxHeight="125"
                        Contain
                        Class="grey darken-4"></MImage>
                <MCardTitle Class="text-h6">
                    max-height with contain
                </MCardTitle>
            </MCard>
        </MCol>
    </MRow>
</MContainer>

DemoList.Name: placeholder
DemoList.Title: 占位符
DemoList.Description: MImage 有一个特别的 PlaceholderContent 插槽，在图像加载时占位显示。 注意：下面的例子有一个错误的 Src，因此图片不会加载，以方便你观察占位符。
DemoList.Code:
<MRow Justify="@JustifyTypes.Center">
    <MImage MaxHeight="300"
            MaxWidth="500"
            Src="https://bad.src/not/valid"
            LazySrc="https://picsum.photos/id/11/100/60">
        <PlaceholderContent>
            <MRow Class="fill-height ma-0"
                  Align="@AlignTypes.Center"
                  Justify="@JustifyTypes.Center">
                <MProgressCircular Indeterminate></MProgressCircular>
            </MRow>
        </PlaceholderContent>
    </MImage>
</MRow>

DemoList.Name: grid
DemoList.Title: 栅格
DemoList.Description: 您可以使用 MImage 来制作图片库。
DemoList.Code: @for (var index = 0; index < 9; index++) { var localVariable = index; }

Subtitle: 图像
Title: Images

Desc: MList 组件用于显示信息。 它可以包含头像、内容、操作、列表组标题等等。 列表以易于在集合中识别特定项目的方式显示内容。 它们为组织一组文本和图像提供了一致的样式。

OtherDocs.注意: 如果您要查找有状态列表项，请查看 MListItemGroup。

DemoList.Name: index
DemoList.Title: 使用
DemoList.Description: 列表有三种基本形式。 单行 (默认), 双行 和 三行. 行声明指定了项目的最小高度，也可以使用相同的属性从 MList 中进行控制。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Class="mx-auto"
        MaxWidth="400"
        Tile>
    <MListItem>
        <MListItemContent>
            <MListItemTitle>Single-line item</MListItemTitle>
        </MListItemContent>
    </MListItem>

    <MListItem TwoLine>
        <MListItemContent>
            <MListItemTitle>Two-line item</MListItemTitle>
            <MListItemSubtitle>Secondary text</MListItemSubtitle>
        </MListItemContent>
    </MListItem>

    <MListItem ThreeLine>
        <MListItemContent>
            <MListItemTitle>Three-line item</MListItemTitle>
            <MListItemSubtitle>
                Secondary line text Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
            </MListItemSubtitle>
            <MListItemSubtitle>
                consectetur adipiscing elit.
            </MListItemSubtitle>
        </MListItemContent>
    </MListItem>
</MCard>

DemoList.Name: dense
DemoList.Title: 密集
DemoList.Description: List 可以通过 Dense 属性变密集。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Class="mx-auto"
       MaxWidth="300"
       tile>
    <MList Dense>
        <MSubheader>REPORTS</MSubheader>
        <MListItemGroup @bind-Value="_selectedItem"
                        Color="primary">
            @foreach (var item in _items)
            {
                <MListItem >
                    <MListItemIcon>
                        <MIcon>
                            @item.Icon
                        </MIcon>
                    </MListItemIcon>
                    <MListItemContent>
                        <MListItemTitle>@item.Text</MListItemTitle>
                    </MListItemContent>
                </MListItem>
            }
        </MListItemGroup>
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code{
    private StringNumber _selectedItem = 1;
    private Item[] _items = new Item[]
    {
       new Item { Text= "Real-Time", Icon= "mdi-clock" },
       new Item { Text= "Audience", Icon= "mdi-account" },
       new Item { Text= "Conversions", Icon= "mdi-flag" }
    };

    class Item
    {
        public string Text { get; set; }
        public string Icon { get; set; }
    }
}

</MCard>

DemoList.Name: nav
DemoList.Title: 导航列表
DemoList.Description: 列表可以接受一个替代的 Nav 样式，它减少了 MListItem 的宽度，并增加了一个边框半径。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Class="mx-auto"
       Width="256"
       tile>
    <MNavigationDrawer permanent>
        <MList>
            <MListItem>
                <MListItemAvatar>
                    <MImage Src="https://cdn.masastack.com/stack/images/website/masa-blazor/jack.png"></MImage>
                </MListItemAvatar>
            </MListItem>

            <MListItem Link>
                <MListItemContent>
                    <MListItemTitle class="text-h6">
                        MASA
                    </MListItemTitle>
                    <MListItemSubtitle>john@masablazor.com</MListItemSubtitle>
                </MListItemContent>

                <MListItemAction>
                    <MIcon>mdi-menu-down</MIcon>
                </MListItemAction>
            </MListItem>
        </MList>
        <MDivider></MDivider>
        <MList Nav
               Dense>
            <MListItemGroup @bind-Value="_selectedItem"
                            Color="primary">
                @foreach (var item in _items)
                {
                    <MListItem>
                        <MListItemIcon>
                            <MIcon>@item.Icon</MIcon>
                        </MListItemIcon>

                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>@item.Text</MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItemContent>
                    </MListItem>
                }
            </MListItemGroup>
        </MList>
    </MNavigationDrawer>
</MCard>

@code{

DemoList.Name: subGroup
DemoList.Title: 嵌套列表
DemoList.Description: 使用 MListGroup 组件，您可以使用 SubGroup 属性创建多达 2 级的深度。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Class="mx-auto"
       Width="300">
    <MList>
        <MListItem>
            <MListItemIcon>
                <MIcon>mdi-home</MIcon>
            </MListItemIcon>

            <MListItemTitle>Home</MListItemTitle>
        </MListItem>

        <MListGroup @bind-Value="userExpanded" PrependIcon="mdi-account-circle">
            <ActivatorContent>
                <MListItemTitle>Users</MListItemTitle>
            </ActivatorContent>
            <ChildContent>
                <MListGroup @bind-Value="adminExpanded" NoAction SubGroup>
                    <ActivatorContent>
                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>Admin</MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItemContent>
                    </ActivatorContent>
                    <ChildContent>
                        @foreach (var item in _admins)
                        {
                            <MListItem Link>
                                <MListItemTitle>@item.Text</MListItemTitle>

                                <MListItemIcon>
                                    <MIcon>@item.Icon</MIcon>
                                </MListItemIcon>
                            </MListItem>
                        }
                    </ChildContent>
                </MListGroup>

                <MListGroup NoAction
                            SubGroup>
                    <ActivatorContent>
                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>Actions</MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItemContent>
                    </ActivatorContent>
                    <ChildContent>
                        @foreach (var item in _cruds)
                        {
                            <MListItem Link>
                                <MListItemTitle>@item.Text</MListItemTitle>

                                <MListItemIcon>
                                    <MIcon>@item.Icon</MIcon>
                                </MListItemIcon>
                            </MListItem>
                        }
                    </ChildContent>
                </MListGroup>
            </ChildContent>
        </MListGroup>
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code{
    readonly Item[] _admins = new Item[]
    {
       new Item { Text= "Management", Icon= "mdi-account-multiple-outline" },
       new Item { Text= "Settings", Icon= "mdi-cog-outline" }
    };

    readonly Item[] _cruds = new Item[]
    {
       new Item { Text= "Create", Icon= "mdi-plus-outline" },
       new Item { Text= "Read", Icon= "mdi-file-outline" },
       new Item { Text= "Update", Icon= "mdi-update" },
       new Item { Text= "Delete", Icon= "mdi-delete" }
    };

    bool userExpanded = true;
    bool adminExpanded = true;

    class Item
    {
        public string Text { get; set; }
        public string Icon { get; set; }
    }
}

DemoList.Name: twoLinesAndSubheader
DemoList.Title: 两行和副标题
DemoList.Description: 列表组件可以包含列表组标题，分割线，以及1行或者更多行，如果副标题文本溢出则会以省略号的形式截断文本。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard MaxWidth="600"
       Class="mx-auto">
    <MToolbar Color="light-blue"
              Dark>
        <MAppBarNavIcon></MAppBarNavIcon>

        <MToolbarTitle>My files</MToolbarTitle>

        <MSpacer></MSpacer>

        <MButton Icon>
            <MIcon>mdi-magnify</MIcon>
        </MButton>

        <MButton Icon>
            <MIcon>mdi-view-module</MIcon>
        </MButton>
    </MToolbar>

    <MList Subheader
           TwoLine>
        <MSubheader Inset>Folders</MSubheader>

        @foreach (var item in _folders)
        {
            <MListItem>
                <MListItemAvatar>
                    <MIcon Class="grey lighten-1"
                           Dark>
                        mdi-folder
                    </MIcon>
                </MListItemAvatar>

                <MListItemContent>
                    <MListItemTitle>@item.Title</MListItemTitle>

                    <MListItemSubtitle>@item.SubTitle</MListItemSubtitle>
                </MListItemContent>

                <MListItemAction>
                    <MButton Icon>
                        <MIcon Color="grey lighten-1">mdi-information</MIcon>
                    </MButton>
                </MListItemAction>
            </MListItem>

        }


        <MDivider Inset></MDivider>

        <MSubheader Inset>Files</MSubheader>

        @foreach (var item in _files)
        {
            <MListItem>
                <MListItemAvatar>
                    <MIcon Class="@item.Color"
                           Dark>@item.Icon</MIcon>
                </MListItemAvatar>

                <MListItemContent>
                    <MListItemTitle>@item.Title</MListItemTitle>

                    <MListItemSubtitle>@item.SubTitle</MListItemSubtitle>
                </MListItemContent>

                <MListItemAction>
                    <MButton Icon>
                        <MIcon Color="grey lighten-1">mdi-information</MIcon>
                    </MButton>
                </MListItemAction>
            </MListItem>
        }
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code{
    private Item[] _files = new Item[]
    {
       new Item 
       {
          Color= "blue",
          Icon= "mdi-clipboard-text",
          SubTitle= "Jan 20, 2014",
          Title= "Vacation itinerary",
       },
        new Item 
        {
          Color= "amber",
          Icon= "mdi-gesture-tap-button",
          SubTitle= "Jan 10, 2014",
          Title= "Kitchen remodel",
        }
    };

    private Item[] _folders = new Item[]
    {
       new Item 
       {
          SubTitle= "Jan 9, 2014",
          Title= "Photos",
       },
       new Item 
       {
          SubTitle= "Jan 17, 2014",
          Title= "Recipes",
       },
       new Item
       {
          SubTitle= "Jan 28, 2014",
          Title= "Work",
       },
    };

    class Item
    {
        public string Color { get; set; }
        public string Icon { get; set; }
        public string Title { get; set; }
        public string SubTitle { get; set; }

}

DemoList.Name: expansionLists
DemoList.Title: 可展开的列表
DemoList.Description: 列表可以包含一组项目，这些项目将在单击MListGroup的ActivatorContent时显示。扩展列表也用于 MNavigationDrawer 组件中。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard Class="mx-auto"
       MaxWidth="500">
    <MToolbar Color="teal"
              Dark>
        <MAppBarNavIcon></MAppBarNavIcon>

        <MToolbarTitle>Topics</MToolbarTitle>

        <MSpacer></MSpacer>

        <MButton Icon>
            <MIcon>mdi-dots-vertical</MIcon>
        </MButton>
    </MToolbar>

    <MList>
        @foreach (var item in items)
        {
            <MListGroup
                @bind-Value="item.Active"
                PrependIcon="@item.Action"
                NoAction>
                <ActivatorContent>
                    <MListItemContent>
                        <MListItemTitle>@item.Title</MListItemTitle>
                    </MListItemContent>
                </ActivatorContent>

                <ChildContent>
                    @foreach (var subItem in item.Items)
                    {
                        <MListItem
                            Value="subItem.Title">
                            <MListItemContent>
                                <MListItemTitle>@item.Title</MListItemTitle>
                            </MListItemContent>
                        </MListItem>
                    }
                </ChildContent>
            </MListGroup>
        }
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code {

            Title = "Dining"
        },
        new Item()
        {
            Action = "mdi-school",
            Items = new List<Item>() {new Item("List Item")},
            Title = "Education"
        },
        new Item()
        {
            Action = "mdi-run",
            Items = new List<Item>() {new Item("List Item")},
            Title = "Family"
        },
        new Item()
        {
            Action = "mdi-bottle-tonic-plus",
            Items = new List<Item>() {new Item("List Item")},

        },
        new Item()
        {
            Action = "mdi-content-cut",
            Items = new List<Item>() {new Item("List Item")},

    {
        public string Title { get; set; }

        public string Action { get; set; }

        public bool Active { get; set; }

        public List<Item> Items { get; set; } = new List<Item>();

        public Item()
        {
        }

        public Item(string title)
        {
            Title = title;
        }
    }

}

DemoList.Name: actionStack
DemoList.Title: 操作栈
DemoList.Description: 列表组件可以包含一个操作栈。当你需要在你的动作项目旁边显示数据文本时，这是非常有用的。
DemoList.Code:
<MCard
    Class="mx-auto"
    MaxWidth="500">
    <MToolbar
        Color="pink"
        Dark>
        <MAppBarNavIcon></MAppBarNavIcon>

        <MToolbarTitle>Inbox</MToolbarTitle>

        <MSpacer></MSpacer>

        <MButton Icon>
            <MIcon>mdi-magnify</MIcon>
        </MButton>

        <MButton Icon>
            <MIcon>mdi-checkbox-marked-circle</MIcon>
        </MButton>
    </MToolbar>

    <MList TwoLine>
        <MListItemGroup
            @bind-Values="selected"
            ActiveClass="pink--text"
            multiple>
            @foreach (var (item, index) in items.Select((item, index) => (item, index)))
            {
                <MListItem Value="@item.title">
                    <ItemContent>
                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>@item.title</MListItemTitle>
                            <MListItemSubtitle Class="text--primary">@item.headline</MListItemSubtitle>
                            <MListItemSubtitle>@item.subtitle</MListItemSubtitle>
                        </MListItemContent>

                        <MListItemAction>
                            <MListItemActionText>@item.action</MListItemActionText>

                            @if (!context.Active)
                            {
                                <MIcon Color="grey lighten-1">
                                    mdi-star-outline
                                </MIcon>
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                <MIcon Color="yellow darken-3">
                                    mdi-star
                                </MIcon>
                            }
                        </MListItemAction>
                    </ItemContent>
                </MListItem>

                @if (index < items.Count - 1)
                {
                    <MDivider/>
                }
            }
        </MListItemGroup>
    </MList>
</MCard>

@code {

    List<StringNumber> selected = new();

    List<(string action, string headline, string subtitle, string title)> items = new List<(string action, string headline, string subtitle, string title)>()
    {
        ("15 min", "Brunch this weekend?","I'll be in your neighborhood doing errands this weekend. Do you want to hang out?", "Ali Connors"),
        ("hr","Summer BBQ","Wish I could come, but I'm out of town this weekend.", "me, Scrott, Jennifer"),
        ("6 hr", "Oui oui","Do you have Paris recommendations? Have you ever been?", "Sandra Adams"),
        ("12 hr", "Birthday gift","Have any ideas about what we should get Heidi for her birthday?", "Trevor Hansen"),
        ("18hr","Recipe to try","We should eat this: Grate, Squash, Corn, and tomatillo Tacos.", "Britta Holt"),
    };

}

DemoList.Name: singleLineList

DemoList.Code:
<MCard
    Class="mx-auto"
    MaxWidth="500">
    <MToolbar
        Color="deep-purple accent-4"
        Dark>
        <MAppBarNavIcon></MAppBarNavIcon>

        <MToolbarTitle>New Chat</MToolbarTitle>

                <MListItemAvatar>
                    <MImage
                        alt="@($"{chat.title} avatar")"
                        Src="@chat.avatar">

DemoList.Name: beforeAllUpload
DemoList.Title: 文件上传前事件
DemoList.Description:
文件上传之前的钩子，你可以自己处理上传逻辑。

//Call JS to handle the upload example
window.Demo.Vditor = {
    uploadFile: (element, index) => {
        let _that = this;
        let vditor = element.Vditor;
        let fileInput = element.querySelector('input[type=file]')
        //Here is the upload logic. This is just an example. You can write your own processing logic
        let formData = new FormData()
        let files = fileInput.files;
        formData.append('file', files[index])
        let oReq = new XMLHttpRequest();
        oReq.onreadystatechange = function () {
            if (oReq.readyState == 4 && oReq.status == 200) {
                let json = JSON.parse(oReq.responseText);
                let imageUrl = json.Path;
                let succFileText = "";
                if (vditor && vditor.vditor.currentMode === "wysiwyg") {
                    succFileText += `\n <img alt=${imageUrl} src="${imageUrl}">`;
                } else {
                    succFileText += `\n![${imageUrl}](${imageUrl})`;
                }
                //Insert the uploaded picture into the editor
                document.execCommand("insertHTML", false, succFileText);
                index += 1;
                if (index < files.length) {
                    _that.Demo.Vditor.uploadFile(element,  index);
                }
                else {
                    fileInput.value = '';
                }
            }
        }
        oReq.open('POST', "/api/upload");//Please change your upload API address
        oReq.send(formData);
    }
};

DemoList.Description: 设置使用 OpenOnHover 属性时，菜单会悬停时打开而不是点击时打开。
DemoList.Code:
DROPDOWN @foreach (var item in items) { @item }
@code { string[] items = { "Click Me", "Click Me", "Click Me", "Click Me 2" }; }

DemoList.Name: rounded
DemoList.Title: 圆角
DemoList.Description: 菜单可以通过 Rounded 属性设置为圆角。关于圆角样式的其他信息在 Border Radius 页。
DemoList.Code:
<MRow Justify="@JustifyTypes.SpaceAround">
    @foreach (var item in _btns)
    {
        var index = Array.IndexOf(_btns, item);
        <MMenu Rounded="@item.rounded" OffsetY @key="@item.text">
            <ActivatorContent>
                <MButton Color="@_colors[index]"
                         Class="white--text ma-5"
                         @attributes="@context.Attrs">
                    @item.text Radius
                </MButton>
            </ActivatorContent>
            <ChildContent>
                <MList>
                    @for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
                    {
                        <MListItem Link>
                            <MListItemTitle>@($"Item {i}")</MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItem>
                    }
                </MList>
            </ChildContent>
        </MMenu>
    }
</MRow>

@code {

    (string text, string rounded)[] _btns =
    {
        ("Removed", "0"),
        ("Large", "lg"),
        ("Custom", "b-xl"),
    };

    string[] _colors =
    {
        "deep-purple accent-4", "error", "teal darken-1"
    };

}

DemoList.Name: activatorAndTooltip
DemoList.Title: 同时使用激活器和提示
DemoList.Description: 在 RenderFragment 语法中，嵌套的激活器，例如用 MMenu 和 MTooltip 附加到同一激活按钮，需要特定的设置才能正常运行。注意：此语法同样用于其他嵌套激活器，例如 MDialog / MTooltip。
DemoList.Code:
@{ var attrs = new Dictionary(); m.Attrs.ToList().ForEach(item => attrs[item.Key] = item.Value); c.Attrs.ToList().ForEach(item => attrs[item.Key] = item.Value); } Dropdown w/ Tooltip Im A ToolTip @foreach (var item in items) { @item }
@code { string[] items = { "Click Me", "Click Me", "Click Me", "Click Me 2" }; }

DemoList.Name: customTransitions
DemoList.Title: 自定义过渡
DemoList.Description: Masa.Blazor 有三个标准过渡，scale，slide-x 和 slide-y。您也可以创建自己的过渡并作为过渡参数传递。
DemoList.Code:
<MRow Justify="JustifyTypes.SpaceAround">
    <MMenu
        Bottom
        Origin="center center"
        Transition="scale-transition">
        <ActivatorContent>
            <MButton
                Color="primary"
                Dark
                @attributes="@context.Attrs">
                Scale Transition
            </MButton>
        </ActivatorContent>

        <ChildContent>
            <MList>
                @foreach (var item in items)
                {
                    <MListItem>
                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>
                                @item
                            </MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItemContent>
                    </MListItem>
                }
            </MList>
        </ChildContent>
    </MMenu>

    <MMenu
        Transition="slide-x-transition"
        Bottom
        Right>
        <ActivatorContent>
            <MButton
                Class="deep-orange"
                Color="primary"
                Dark
                @attributes="@context.Attrs">
                Slide X Transition
            </MButton>
        </ActivatorContent>

        <ChildContent>
            <MList>
                @foreach (var item in items)
                {
                    <MListItem>
                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>
                                @item
                            </MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItemContent>
                    </MListItem>
                }
            </MList>
        </ChildContent>
    </MMenu>

    <MMenu
        Transition="slide-y-transition"
        Bottom>
        <ActivatorContent>
            <MButton
                Class="purple"
                Color="primary"
                Dark
                @attributes="@context.Attrs">
                Slide Y Transition
            </MButton>
        </ActivatorContent>

        <ChildContent>
            <MList>
                @foreach (var item in items)
                {
                    <MListItem>
                        <MListItemContent>
                            <MListItemTitle>
                                @item
                            </MListItemTitle>
                        </MListItemContent>
                    </MListItem>
                }
            </MList>
        </ChildContent>
    </MMenu>
</MRow>

@code {

    string[] items =
    {
        "Click Me",
        "Click Me",
        "Click Me",
        "Click Me 2"
    };

}
